faq.question: Is SummarizePDF secure enough for confidential legal documents?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We're SOC 2 Type II certified with bank-level encryption. Your documents are encrypted in transit and at rest, and we never use your data to train AI models. Many law firms use us for highly sensitive M&A deals and litigation.

faq.question: How accurate are the summaries for complex legal documents?
faq.answer: Our AI is specifically trained on legal language and maintains high accuracy. However, we always recommend attorney review of summaries before relying on them for critical decisions. Think of it as a highly intelligent paralegal draft.

faq.question: Can multiple attorneys collaborate on the same documents?
faq.answer: Yes! Our Team plan allows unlimited users to share and collaborate on summarized documents. Build a firm-wide knowledge base of contracts, cases, and research.

faq.question: What's included in the Legal plan?
faq.answer: The Pro plan ($19/mo) includes 500 pages/month, priority support, and advanced features. The Team plan ($49/mo) adds unlimited users, shared workspaces, and custom retention policies. See full pricing details.

faq.question: How does billing work for law firms?
faq.answer: We offer monthly and annual billing. Annual plans save 20%. Enterprise firms can pay via invoice and get custom contracts. Contact sales for firm-wide licensing.

faq.question: Can I export summaries for client deliverables?
faq.answer: Yes! Export summaries as PDF, Word, or plain text. Include your firm's branding and use them in client memos and briefings.
